title: AnalysisRequestHandler UI
description: The AnalysisRequestHandler currently requires some command-line pain to use, or lots of XML typing in a stream.body URL parameter.  This patch is a simple HTML POST front-end to using stream.body with this request handler.  Maybe this should be added to Solr admin?
